title: Tour de France Femmes unsung heroes: Elena Cecchini on dogs, family, home, and Elia Viviani’s hate of tails
content:
The Italian grew up around animals on her grandmother's farm, but she always dreamed of having her own dog.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes unsung heroes: Elena Cecchini on dogs, family, home, and Elia Viviani’s hate of tails on Velo.
